title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 363 - State Aid For Planning For Collection, Treatment And Disposal Of Refuse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 363 - State Aid For Planning For Collection, Treatment And Disposal Of Refuse

State Regulations

Subpart 363-1 - APPLICABILITY (§ 363-1.1)

Subpart 363-2 - Exempt Facilities (§ 363-2.1)

Subpart 363-3 - Inactive Disposal Facilities (§ 363-3.1 to 363-3.2)

Subpart 363-4 - Permit Application Requirements (§ 363-4.1 to 363-4.6)

Subpart 363-5 - siting Requirements (§ 363-5.1)

Subpart 363-6 - Design, Construction And Certification Requirements (§ 363-6.1 to 363-6.22)

Subpart 363-7 - Operating Requirements (§ 363-7.1 to 363-7.2)

Subpart 363-8 - Recordkeeping and Reporting (§ 363-8.1 to 363-8.2)

Subpart 363-9 - CLOSURE, POST-CLOSURE, AND CUSTODIAL CARE (§ 363-9.1 to 363-9.7)

Subpart 363-10 - Corrective Measures (§ 363-10.1)

Subpart 363-11 - Landfill Reclamation (§ 363-11.1 to 363-11.6)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 363

Amended

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law
§§ 1-0101, 3-0301, titles 3, 5, 7 and 8 of article 17, 19-0301,19-0303,19-0306, titles 1, 3, 7, 9, 10, 13, 15, 18, 21, 25, 26, 29 of
article 27, 27-1901, 27-1903, 27-1911, title 1 of article 70, and titles 27, 35
and 40 of article 71. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
